coded_answer.p: I am writtingwriting to reply to your letter and comenicatecommunicate my aceptanceacceptance of the first prize in your Competition.

This summer, I am available onin July because onin AgustAugust my family and I are going to go to Canada and onin September I will go back atto university. If there is no chance to go to California onin July, I could wait untilluntil next summer.
About accommodation, I would like to have a longlog cabin because last year I had an accident and my back iswas enjureinjured, so sleeping in a tent it would be painful for me.

I play basketball at university and my levelstandard is quite good but what I am really enjoying is being a referee. Due to my back enjureinjury, this year I could not train and play with my team, so I am not fit, it. It would be a good aideaidea to be a referee. I would like to swim everyday if it is ablepossible. AlthoungAlthough swimming is so boredboring, it would be a good thing helpto help for curingcure my back.

Looking forwards to hearing from you

It was brilliant! I had the best month inof my life. It was a hard month because my job was very hard,. I worked 12 hours per day but alwalysalways with funnyfun people. My job was cleaning the groundfloor after the concert; "it was very dirty". It wasn't a nice job but I had all night for drinking and dancing of course,. I had notdidn't have to pay for gettingto get in.

I feltfell in love with a beautiful girl "Calen", she. She is from Spain and was selling "hot dogs". She will come to Liverpool next week and I'll put her up. Probably she'll come with a friend and if you want you can enjoyjoin us.
Helping at the pop concert has been a great experience because I've donemet a new friends and I know that inat the concert there isn'taren't any drunkdrunks just funnyfun and, wonderful people.

I am looking forward to next summer because I'd like to go to Spain to help inwith "Doctor Meesee", thatwhich is the best concert in the world,. I hope you will come there. You have to save up some money because Spain is too expensive (beach, beer, discos..).
